scripts.typeorm: nx build database && npx typeorm -d dist/libs/database/src/data-source.js
scripts.typeorm:cli: nx build database && npx typeorm -d dist/libs/database/src/data-source.js --cli
scripts.migration:generate: nx build database && npx typeorm -d dist/libs/database/src/data-source.js migration:generate ./libs/database/src/migrations/$npm_config_name
scripts.migration:run: nx build database && npx typeorm -d dist/libs/database/src/data-source.js migration:run
scripts.migration:revert: nx build database && npx typeorm -d dist/libs/database/src/data-source.js migration:revert
scripts.build:api: nx build api && docker build -t days-api -f ./apps/api/Dockerfile . && docker compose up --detach
